meanings.definition: The transportation of goods or people by sea.
meanings.sent1: The sealifts carried supplies to the island.
meanings.sent2: The company relied on sealifts to deliver their products overseas.
meanings.sent3: The sealifts decided to take a detour and visit a nearby dolphin sanctuary.
meanings.sent4: The sealifts glided through the ocean like graceful dancers.
meanings.sent5: The sealifts braved the stormy seas to reach their destination.

meanings.definition: A fleet of ships used for transporting goods or people by sea.
meanings.sent1: The sealifts were ready to depart for the international voyage.
meanings.sent2: The sealifts lined up at the port, ready to set sail.
meanings.sent3: The sealifts threw a party on board to celebrate a successful journey.
meanings.sent4: The sealifts stood tall against the vast expanse of the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The sealifts worked together seamlessly to deliver the cargo on time.
